00031 /* ============================================================================
00032  * Revision History
00033  * ================
00034  * 25-Aug-2008 Added DMA for CSL.
00035  * 27-Aug-2008 Updated for Doxygen.
00036  * 28-Aug-2008 Added Return Types for Error checking for API's parameter.
00037  * 01-Oct-2008 Added additional parameter CSL_DMA_ChannelObj pointer to the
00038  *             DMA_open() API.
00039  * 08-May-2009 Added DMA_swapWords API for C5505 PG1.4
00040  * 26-May-2009 Modified as per the review comments
00041  * 17-Dec-2009 Added Support for Ping-Pong mode for chip C5515
00042  * 11-Jan-2010 Modified as per the review comments
00043  * 13-Aug-2010 CSL v2.10 release
00044  * 06-Jul-2011 CSL v2.50 release
00045  * 26-Jun-2012 Added McSPI and McBSP functions
00046  * 13-Sep-2012 CSL v3.00 release
00047  * 20-Dec-2012 CSL v3.01 release

01013 /******************************************************************************
01014  * CSL DMA Inline function
01015  *****************************************************************************/
01087 static inline
01088 Int DMA_getStatus (
01092     CSL_DMA_Handle            hDMA
01093 )
01094 {
01095     Int       status;
01096     Uint16    chanNum;
01097 
01098     if(hDMA != NULL)
01099     {
01100         chanNum = hDMA->chanNum;
01101 
01102         while(chanNum >= CSL_DMA_PER_CNT)
01103         {
01104             chanNum = chanNum - CSL_DMA_PER_CNT;
01105         }
01106 
01107         switch((CSL_DMAChanNum)chanNum)
01108         {
01109 #if (defined(CHIP_C5517))
01110             case CSL_DMA_CHAN0:
01111                 status = CSL_FEXT(hDMA->dmaRegs->DMACH0TCRU, DMA_DMACH0TCRU_EN);
01112                 break;
01113             case CSL_DMA_CHAN1:
01114                 status = CSL_FEXT(hDMA->dmaRegs->DMACH1TCRU, DMA_DMACH1TCRU_EN);
01115                 break;
01116             case CSL_DMA_CHAN2:
01117                 status = CSL_FEXT(hDMA->dmaRegs->DMACH2TCRU, DMA_DMACH2TCRU_EN);
01118                 break;
01119             case CSL_DMA_CHAN3:
01120                 status = CSL_FEXT(hDMA->dmaRegs->DMACH3TCRU, DMA_DMACH3TCRU_EN);
01121                 break;
01122 #else
01123             case CSL_DMA_CHAN0:
01124                 status = CSL_FEXT(hDMA->dmaRegs->DMACH0TCR2, DMA_DMACH0TCR2_EN);
01125                 break;
01126             case CSL_DMA_CHAN1:
01127                 status = CSL_FEXT(hDMA->dmaRegs->DMACH1TCR2, DMA_DMACH1TCR2_EN);
01128                 break;
01129             case CSL_DMA_CHAN2:
01130                 status = CSL_FEXT(hDMA->dmaRegs->DMACH2TCR2, DMA_DMACH2TCR2_EN);
01131                 break;
01132             case CSL_DMA_CHAN3:
01133                 status = CSL_FEXT(hDMA->dmaRegs->DMACH3TCR2, DMA_DMACH3TCR2_EN);
01134                 break;
01135 #endif
01136         }
01137     }
01138     else
01139     {
01140         status = CSL_ESYS_BADHANDLE;
01141     }
01142 
01143     return status;
01144 }
01148 #ifdef __cplusplus
01149 }
01150 #endif
